root.name: Music Maker
root.description: OverviewMusic Maker is a music creation tool/game developed and published by Magix and released on the PlayStation 2 platform.Music Maker is software that enables the user to create full length songs using small repeatable clips of music called loops. These loops are combined together to create the song.Music Maker also features a music video mode which enables the user to put their music to a custom made video using built in visualizations, images, and effects.
